channel.title: Help now please!
channel.description:
hey i got a few problems on my server.
1. how to get the npc's to dont talk. like wise old man says "welcome to staff zone" in the staff zone. please help
2. how to add commands i dont got a command folder :S
3. last one :D how can i change my npc list becuz when i type ::npc50 hans appear hans appear on 10-50 and the npcs i spawn hit like 500hp.
help me please thx..[br][br][size=1]Posted on: September 06, 2009, 10:27:48 am[/size][hr]and a lvl 2 man has 1m hp and hits 99 on 1 hit help me

well said. i was gonna say that too

item.title: Help now please!
item.dc:creator: @Epic_Ancient Epic Ancient
item.description:
@Epic_Ancient wrote:

[quote=“Mercifies, post:12, topic:300500”]no thats not the problem…

the problem is the npc’s are hitting really high. Changing the xp per hit only changes how long it will take for you to level…[/quote]
He did say he got like 1 exp per hit.

no thats not the problem…

the problem is the npc’s are hitting really high. Changing the xp per hit only changes how long it will take for you to level…

item.title: Help now please!
item.dc:creator: @patsquare patsquare
item.description:
@patsquare wrote:

to change xp per hit try this :
serch for * hitDiff);
something like this should come up

{ TotalExp = (double) (300 * hitDiff); TotalExp = (double) (TotalExp * CombatExpRate); addSkillXP((int) (TotalExp), playerAttack); } else if (FightType == 2) // Agressive { TotalExp = (double) (300 * hitDiff); TotalExp = (double) (TotalExp * CombatExpRate); addSkillXP((int) (TotalExp), playerStrength); } else if (FightType == 4) // Defensive { TotalExp = (double) (300 * hitDiff); TotalExp = (double) (TotalExp * CombatExpRate); addSkillXP((int) (TotalExp), playerDefence); } else if (FightType == 3) // Controlled { TotalExp = (double) (300 * hitDiff); TotalExp = (double) (TotalExp * CombatExpRate); addSkillXP((int) (TotalExp), playerStrength); }
change the 300 to your dezired xp per hit you want

Read full topic

item.title: Help now please!
item.dc:creator: @Mercifies Mercifies
item.description:
@Mercifies wrote:

To change starter text, go into client.java until you see something like: (Credits to h00d cause this is his source)

sendQuest("@red@~ @bla@~@red@z@bla@i@red@g@bla@g@red@l@bla@y@red@s@bla@c@red@a@bla@p@red@e@bla@~ @red@~", 15950); sendQuest("", 15960); sendQuest("", 15961); sendQuest("Server created by - hood and h00d", 15959); sendQuest("", 15951); sendQuest("Reputation: @whi@" + Rep, 15952); sendQuest("Latest Update - type ::fightpits!", 15953); sendQuest("Have Fun...", 15954); sendQuest("", 15955); sendQuest("", 15956); sendQuest("", 15957); sendQuest("", 15958);
There are going to be 2 of these, one is longer and one is shorter. The shorter one, is the first one you will see, changes nothing. The second one you can you will see. You can find these just by scrolling down a little.

Sorry I haven’t figured out your npc problem yet but will post when I figure it out.

I hope this helped

Read full topic

thx all off you but one more problem.

the npc’s are hitting like max hit. the hit 99’s on me[br][br][size=1]Posted on: September 06, 2009, 12:28:52 pm[/size][hr]and when im using ::npc 999 its a demon or some coming up but when its dead it wont show up anymore[br][br][size=1]Posted on: September 06, 2009, 12:51:25 pm[/size][hr]and how to change the starter text like

hey welcome to *****scape
type ::rules for the rules
and ::help for help
enjoy the game
owner: MYNAME

how to change that becuz on my it says

welcom to VFSOK
DFBGVSDGHBSFG

GOODDAJH

item.title: Help now please!
item.dc:creator: @Epic_Ancient Epic Ancient
item.description:
@Epic_Ancient wrote:

[quote=“pk3r john, post:7, topic:300500”][quote author=kneistol link=topic=396766.msg2946807#msg2946807 date=1252259937]
ok thx buti got a prob more.

my server give 1 exp per hot how to change
[/quote]

Your client class, search for fightType[/quote]

Offtopic: Why do you keep saying client class? Client.java file* That confuses new coders.
Ontopic: Or just search around for individual posibilities of damagetoexp, such as magic, which gives each spell its own amount of exp per damage dealt, per spell.

Read full topic

item.title: Help now please!
item.dc:creator: @sexy_slay sexy slay
item.description:
@sexy_slay wrote:

  1. How to make npc not talk… Go into npchandler.java, seach what the npc says. Delete. Problem Solved.
  2. There is no “commands folder” all of your commands are in client.java. There are many tutorials on how to add/make commands.
  3. I’m not excatly sure, the only advice i might say will work. Is open npc.cfg, and make hans # 50, and make kbd # 0, or something similar to that.
    Hope I helped
  • Sexy Slay

Read full topic
